# E60HL-240050-B RFISO: National Master Standing Offers for Aviation Fuels

### Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting tenders for the National Master Standing Offers for aviation fuels (Into-Plane) to various locations in Canada.

### Tender Details

- **Tender Title**: E60HL-240050-B RFISO National Master Standing Offers for Aviation Fuels
- **UNSPSC Code**: 15101504 - Aviation fuel
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFISO)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Variations or combinations of the above methods
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable trade agreements
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None
- **Regions of Delivery**: Multiple locations across Canada, including Manitoba, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, Ontario, Nova Scotia, and others
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact Information**: Bobbi MacLeod, bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description

The PSPC is seeking bidders for the supply of aviation fuels (Into-Plane) to various locations in Canada. The procurement is subject to Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCAs).

*   The PIL contract does not have a PIL modification log at this time.
*   The procurement encourages offerors to submit an Indigenous Participation Plan (IPP) as part of their offer.
*   The PSPC will provide a debriefing or feedback session upon request to offerors who provided offers on the previous request for standing offer.
*   This procurement is for a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) and will be valid for a period of two years.

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed through Ariba Discovery, reference number WS4456627547, Doc4568588347.

### Bid Submissions

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on May 21, 2024 by 2:00 PM EDT
